niyojya polispathi thanathura sandaha 2005 mayi 11da usaswim labimen pasuwath masaka kalayak mathdrawya nashaka karyanshayata sewawak laba dun hethema inpasuwa kolambaa disawa, wayambaa disawa, uthura, madhyama palatha bhara niyojya polispathi lesin wishesha rajakariyak kaleya.2010 juni 02 da jyeshta niyojya polispathi thanathura sandaha pathwu pujith jayasundara mahatha uuwa palatha, wayambaa palatha, nagenahira palatha ha uthuru palatha, bhara jyeshta niyojya polispathi washayen katayuthu kaleya. 2015 janawari 27 da sita basnahira disawa bhara jyeshta niyojya polispathi washayenda pujith jayasundara mahatha katayuthu kaleya.
